title: Fork, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has three long curved tines, rounded shoulder and flat baluster-shapedneck ending in a threaded projection.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. steel, brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-263-a.
